name: Filament (itch)
description:
Zip along the filament, avoiding obstacles.

Filament is our submission for the GMTK 2019 game jam. The theme is "only one". Here you have a single axis of control: you can only move forward or back along the path.

Controls

Move your character forward or back along the path with up/down arrows, W/S, or gamepad left-stick or D-pad.

Exit with escape or gamepad start/back/B buttons.

To play levels out of order, switch between them with PageDown/PageUp or gamepad right/left shoulder buttons (bumpers).
